code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{ListDetailContext}from'../../providers/ListDetailProvider';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddItem=_ref=>{let{onClose}=_ref;const{addItem}=useContext(ListDetailContext);const[itemName,setItemName]=useState('');const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(1);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();addItem(itemName,quantity);onClose();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"item-name",className:"form-label",children:"Enter item name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"item-name",name:"itemName",className:"form-control",value:itemName,onChange:e=>setItemName(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"item-quantity",className:"form-label",children:"Enter quantity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"item-quantity",name:"itemQuantity",className:"form-control",value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(Number(e.target.value)),min:"1",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Add Item"})]});};export default AddItem;
